title: Chocolate Pot And Cover, ca. 1735
markings: On base of teapot, in overglaze "no 40" is written in a peachy cream color.  Under the lid, black overglaze "1032 nll (in script) 67.W"
description: Pear-shaped, on rounded flaring circular foot, scrolled handle, simple triangular spout, domed cover with round finial. Solid gilding on foot, handle, spout, edge of mouth and cover, and finial. Engraved gilt chinoiserie decoration of figures, birds and trees, with scrollwork. Coverattached with siver-gilt mounting.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chocolate Pot And Cover, ca. 1735.
ca. 1735. Glazed porcelain, gilding. Bequest of Erskine Hewitt. 1938-57-633.
